item.title: The benefit in 'Archaic' Email interfaces
item.description: I started out as a organised person who liked neat handwriting, extensive notes and a systematic approach to doing things. It’s been a couple of years that I’ve been using mu4e as my primary driver for dealing with email. Though I do on occasion rely on the web based interface, using mu4e has enabled me to master my email, like no other tool that I’ve ever used. Before using mu4e, and the fastmail setup, I never really had any grip of my email inbox and could never leverage and utilise the wealth of data that lurks in each corner.
